name: Cube SCP-087
description:
Based on SCP-087

Inspired of Haversine's game and Undertow game of SCP-087, also in the Minecraft cubic and pixeled style.

This version is a completely remake of my old game with the same name, adding procedural generation for the floors and random events.

Remake made in 4 days

The first version (of 2014) can found in IndieDB

It is attributed to Joonas ("Regalis") Rikkonen in the use of derived assets from his work.
